pr_title: PARQUET-1790: Add Api for writing DataPageV2 to ParquetFileWriter class

timeline.message: PARQUET-1790: Add Api for writing DataPageV2 to ParquetFileWriter class

timeline.bodyText: In other places we use java.util.Math.toIntExact(long).
timeline.author: gszadovszky

replies.bodyText: Yes you are right, I was thinking of keeping it this way here(like in ColumnChunkPageWriteStore ) so the message can be clearer to the caller of what failed
replies.author: brimzi

replies.bodyText:
It's fine for me.
Then, I would suggest using a similar approach of implementation then they have it in toIntExact(long). The one you used is not universal (think of negative numbers out of int).
replies.author: gszadovszky

timeline.message: PARQUET-1790: apply review suggestions - use a more universal approach to int check
